articles.description: After the Michigan State University community was paralyzed by a horrific mass shooting that killed three students, injured five others and halted campus activity, the school will begin to resume athletic and academic life, as many are still struggling to mak…

articles.title: Jenna Ortega, Travis Kelce to Debut as SNL Hosts - Rolling Stone
articles.description: The ‘Wednesday’ actress and Kansas City Chiefs tight end will join Woody Harrelson on the weekend stage
articles.content: Following the Kansas City Chiefs win at the Super Bowl, tight end Travis Kelce will head to New York to host “Saturday Night Live” on March 4. The following week, “Wednesday” actress Jenna Ortega wil… [+1064 chars]

articles.author: WRAL
articles.title: NC State rallies past No. 19 North Carolina in OT, 77-66 :: WRALSportsFan.com - WRALSportsFan
articles.description: Aziaha James led North Carolina State back from a 10-point deficit with just over four minutes to play in regulation, then scored seven points in overtime to carry the Wolfpack to a 77-66 win over No. 19 North Carolina on Thursday night.
articles.content:
By The Associated Press
